title: Bombs rip through Shiite procession in Bangladesh, 1 dead
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
As thousands of Shiite Muslims gathered for a religious procession before dawn Saturday, unidentified attackers hurled home-made bombs that ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
